scripts.preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev
scripts.deploy: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy --branch=preview
scripts.deploy:prod: branch=$(git branch --show-current); if [[ $branch == 'main' || $branch == 'master' ]]; then npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy; else echo 'Prod deployments allowed from main branch only'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.db:migrate:preview: wrangler d1 migrations apply --env preview next-cloudflare-preview-db --remote
scripts.db:studio:preview: cross-env $(grep -v '^#' .dev.vars | xargs) $(grep -m 2 "^database_id=" wrangler.toml | tail -n1) drizzle-kit studio
scripts.db:reset:local: wrangler d1 execute next-cloudflare-prod-db --local --file=./lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:local
scripts.db:reset:preview: wrangler d1 execute --env preview next-cloudflare-preview-db --remote --file=./lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:preview
scripts.db:reset:prod: wrangler d1 execute next-cloudflare-prod-db --remote --file=./lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:prod
